Name: Talk to Olivia.
Description: Talk to Olivia for the first time.

Name: Give Olivia a flower.
Description: Give Olivia a flower from the market or the forest.
WinConditionDescription: Olivia gets at least 1 flower from the Player.

Name: Ask Olivia about Khana.
Description: Ask Olivia about Khana and about the one you saw.
WinConditionDescription: The correct dialogue option is selected.
